main event: A UFO sighting was reported on January 12, 1958, in Peoria, Illinois, involving an unidentified object observed for approximately 10 minutes.
interesting points: The object was described as approximately 14 ft by 22 ft in size, dull aluminum with a triangular shape,The object moved northwest to east before departing to the west without acceleration,Analysis suggested it could possibly be a balloon, despite being observed in broad daylight by multiple individuals,The object had no lights, portholes, or sound and hovered above electric light poles.
sighted object: Elliptical object approximately 14 ft by 28 ft with five triangular fins
witness description: Two female witnesses in an automobile returning home from church
